turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you do me a favor a order me a pizza from Pats?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pats in Pt. Boro?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Philly Special.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so a Philly Special is peppers, onions, mushrooms and sausage right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right but I'm not feeling mushrooms today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so you want a Philly Special minus the mushrooms

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's right

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of style pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm feeling Grandma style today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it an extra large. I'm feeling quite hungry today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great so that's an Extra Large Grandma Style Philly Special with no mushrooms?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pick up or Delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll just go pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. I just called it in. They said it will be about 25 minutes and your order number is 33. Ayour receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope that's all for now thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you!

items.name: Ok great. I just called it in. They said it will be about 25 minut
